info.title: Navigate out of a checkbox group  in reading mode

user: Navigate from a checkbox inside the checkbox group to an element outside the checkbox group. Test both navigating forward out of the end and backward out of the start.
instructions.raw: Navigate from a checkbox inside the checkbox group to an element outside the checkbox group. Test both navigating forward out of the end and backward out of the start.
instructions.mode: Insure NVDA is in browse mode by pressing Escape. Note: This command has no effect if NVDA is already in browse mode.
